EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending the Repair Assistant Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
THANK YOU FOR ATTENDING!
Thank you for attending our workshop on the GoDirect Maintenance Advisor Repair Assistant during the IATA Maintenance Cost Conference.
Repair Assistant uses artificial intelligence, past maintenance records and your aircraft's service manuals to confidently identify the best solution to maintenance issues.
Want to stay informed about new features, or learn how the app can save time and money for your shop in particular? Please click below to sign up for updates or to request a demo.
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
